{{Infobox Artist Discography |Artist = [[Crystal Kay]] |Image = Crystal Kay 10th Anniversary Tour CK10.jpg |Image size = 200px |Studio = 9 |Studio link = Studio albums |Compilation = 3 |Comp link = Compilation albums |EP = 2 |EP link = EPs |Video = |Video link = |Singles = 31 |Singles link = Singles }} The discography of [[Crystal Kay]], a Japanese [[Pop music|pop]] singer. Kay debuted in 1999 with the single "[[Eternal Memories]]" at the age of thirteen. Her 2007 album "[[All Yours]]" became her first number-one release in June of that year. Her best selling single is {{nihongo|"Koi ni Ochitara"|æã«ãã¡ãã|If I Fall in Love}}. == Studio albums == {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan="2"| Information ! colspan="1"| [[Japan|JPN]] ! rowspan="2"| Japanese Sales ! rowspan="2"| [[RIAJ]] [[Music recording sales certification|certification]]
